  • Constructor Details

    • Thief

      public Thief(Double theHit, int theAttack, String theName, int theMin, int theMax, Double theBlock, double theCritChance)
      THis is the super class for all hero characters
      Parameters:
      theHit - the characters health
      theAttack - the attack speed
      theName - the name for the character
      theMin - the min damage
      theMax - the max damage
      theBlock - the block speed

  • Method Details

    • specialSkill

      public double specialSkill(DungeonCharacter theEnemy)
      Thief's special attack mechanics. 40 percent chance it is successful. If it is successful, Thief gets an attack and another turn (extra attack) in the current round. There is a 20 percent chance the Thief is caught in which case no attack at all is rendered. The other 40 percent is just a normal attack.
      Specified by:
      specialSkill in class Hero
      Returns:
      0 if the thief failed to perform this attack 1 if the thief succeed at a stealth attack 2 if the thief gained additional attack speed next round

    • normalAttackMove

      double[] normalAttackMove()
      Loop reflecting attack speed (how many times this character can strike in a turn) Has bonus attack speed Call the singular attack methods to represent a strike
      Overrides:
      normalAttackMove in class DungeonCharacter
      Returns:
      an array, showing the damage for each strike
